price: (Mwenyezi Mungu) akasema: Basi toka humo, kwani hakika wewe ni maluuni!
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu akasema: Ukiwa wewe umekuwa a'asi, umetokana na ut'iifu wangu, basi tokelea mbali kwenye Bustani hii! Kwani hakika wewe umefukuzwa kwenye rehema yangu pahala pa hishima.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
